Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations

Class GameOperationsExecutor

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.GameOperationsExecutor
public class GameOperationsExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
Brief Represents a GameOperation executor that ca handle multiple operations in a row. It is responsible of applying the results from operation to operation and handling wins and losses
